props.indeterminate: Constantly animates, use when loading progress is unknown. If set to the string `'disable-shrink'` it will use a simpler animation that does not run on the main thread.
props.rounded: Rounds the ends of the progress arc for a softer appearance. When enabled, the progress stroke will have rounded caps instead of square ends.
props.modelValue: The percentage value for current progress.
props.rotate: Rotates the circle start point in degrees.
props.size: Sets the diameter of the circle in pixels.
props.width: Sets the stroke of the circle in pixels.
